root.name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars - Jedi Alliance
root.description: Star Wars: The Clone Wars - Jedi Alliance is an upcoming Star Wars video game that will be set in the Clone Wars, between Episodes II and III. You will choose a pair of Jedi and use teamwork to solve puzzles and defeat enemies.The better the relationship between the pair, the more effective your tag team moves are. There are quite a few selectable characters. These are:Obi-Wan KenobiAnakin SkywalkerPlo KoonAhsoka TanoMace WinduKit FistoOccasionly C3PO and R2-D2 are playable. But Yoda, Jabba and Ziro the hutt and Padme Amidala are also in the cutscenes.Â The game was released on November 11th 2008
